name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation
descr: 关于这款游戏20XX – Gamindustri faces a dire crisis! Ever since the advent of ASIC – the Arfoire Syndicate of International Crime - morality has all but vanished. As much as 80 percent of all students are rumored to worship a being known as Arfoire, and the authorities have chosen to turn a blind eye to the threat. Basically, Gamindustri is pretty messed up, you guys. Ahem. Thus did Gamindustri fall into complete and utter disarray.Will the goddesses be able to reclaim their world from ASIC’s grasp, or will they be forced to wander the Gamindustri Graveyard, forever lost?Key FeaturesGamindustri in 1080!Experience all the humor, turn-based battle, and crazy HDD transformations of Re;Birth2 with the sheen of 1080p excellence!Four or More for War!Have up to 4 characters on the battlefield, and 4 more on the sidelines, ready to jump in and give their support!Stella goes Rogue!Send Stella out to brave Gamindustri’s dungeons in this realtime mini-game and she’ll collect all kinds of treasure for you – you just sit back and eat pudding! Be careful though, because if she dies in the dungeon, she’ll lose all her special gear!The World’s your Oyster!Customize the Gamindustri experience with Plans, which allow you to do things like increase/decrease enemy difficulty, change the items you’ll receive from a dungeon, and more!Build-a-Sword!Use Idea Chips and Blank Discs to create custom equipment that can open up new worlds of skills for you!
detail:
名称: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation
类型: 角色扮演, 策略
开发商: Idea Factory, Compile Heart, Felistella
发行商: Idea Factory, Idea Factory International
系列: Official Neptunia, Official Idea Factory Intl.
发行日期: 2015 年 5 月 29 日
review: 全部评测: 特别好评 (2,695) - 此游戏的 2,695 篇用户评测中有 92% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (2,695 篇中的 92%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7(64bit)
处理器: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
DirectX 版本: 10
存储空间: 需要 7 GB 可用空间
声卡: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
附注事项: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
推荐配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7(64bit) or later
处理器: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
内存: 6 GB RAM
显卡: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
DirectX 版本: 10
存储空间: 需要 7 GB 可用空间
声卡: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
附注事项: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
name_chs: 超次元海王星：重生2-姐妹时代
